programme.desc: Cherif: Created by Lionel Olenga, Stéphane Drouet, Laurent Scalese. With Abdelhafid Metalsi, Greg Germain, François Bureloup, Vincent Primault. programme.title: Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem
Kochanie, chyba cię zabiłem
programme.desc: Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem: Directed by Jakub Niescierow. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Arkadiusz Jakubik, Ireneusz Czop, Marcin Korcz. An employee at a video rental shop accidentally discovers a recording of a murder. The killer is the husband, the victim is his unfaithful wife. Hoping for easy money, the kid decides to blackmail the husband. Together, they set off to the coast, where the killer keeps his saving in a bank deposit. They are followed by two rather incompetent cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3686942/","name":"Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZmZGQ0ODctMmU0OS00MTU5LWIyN2UtZmUxZjI2MTM2MmY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An employee at a video rental shop accidentally discovers a recording of a murder. IMDb data; ttnr: 3686942, Title: Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem, --- Description: Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem: Directed by Jakub Niescierow. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Arkadiusz Jakubik, Ireneusz Czop, Marcin Korcz. An employee at a video rental shop accidentally discovers a recording of a murder. The killer is the husband, the victim is his unfaithful wife. Hoping for easy money, the kid decides to blackmail the husband. Together, they set off to the coast, where the killer keeps his saving in a bank deposit. They are followed by two rather incompetent cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3686942/","name":"Kochanie, chyba cie zabilem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZmZGQ0ODctMmU0OS00MTU5LWIyN2UtZmUxZjI2MTM2MmY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An employee at a video rental shop accidentally discovers a recording of a murder. programme.title: London Town
London Town
programme.desc:
London Town: Directed by Derrick Borte. With Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Daniel Huttlestone, Dougray Scott, Natascha McElhone. In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1724597/","name":"London Town","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NjU2MjYzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk4NzgwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1724597/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"katzco-545-81470"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that is music for the eyes, the ears and the heart!","reviewBody":"Every once in a while a little film, with a tiny budget and a whole lot of heart, comes along and knocks you off your feet. London Town fulfills all the aspects of that category. 

I won't bother to give you a blow by blow description of the story, that's easily found elsewhere. I will tell you I was more than thoroughly entertained and, since it was a 48 hour rental via my VOD system, I took the opportunity to watch it three times because it was just that good! The film is endearing, funny and the performances are stellar, especially the youngsters. Huttlestone is already on his way as a multi-talent, but Nell Williams was a new revelation for me and she shines here. 

If for no other reason, you need to see this film for the incredibly brilliant work of Jonathan Rhys Meyers as Joe Strummer. He is simply mesmerizing and delivers a musical performance equal to that of any contemporary or historical rock star. (As a veteran of 7 Stones and 14 WHO concerts, I feel justified in that statement.) Derrick Borte managed to assemble a superb group of musicians to portray the rest of the band and the results are magical. 

London Town is a special film, with something for everyone to love. Don't miss it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2297,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"the clash,pantyhose,miniskirt,fishnet pantyhose,losing virginity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3651909145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4NDMyMTU2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM1MDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4NDMyMTU2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM1MDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 70's London, a teenager is introduced to The Clash by his estranged mother and it changes his life forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4948519/","name":"Daniel Huttlestone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779084/","name":"Dougray Scott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097517/","name":"Derrick Borte"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296298/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375102/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114226/","name":"Matt Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839503/","name":"Sonya Gildea"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792202/","name":"Kirsten Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dialog
programme.desc: Björn Andrésen miał 15 lat, gdy w 1971 roku zagrał u włoskiego reżysera Luchino Viscontiego rolę Tadzia w "Śmierci w Wenecji". Zdobył nią międzynarodową sławę. Sukces stał się jednak jego przekleństwem. Obecnie mężczyzna walczy z demonami przeszłości. Rozpamiętuje śmierć matki i traumy przeżyte na planie filmowym. Mówi również o chorobie alkoholowej.

programme.title: The Most Beautiful Boy in the World
Najpiękniejszy chłopiec na świecie
Världens vackraste pojke
programme.desc: The Most Beautiful Boy in the World: Directed by Kristina Lindström, Kristian Petri. With Annike Andresen, Björn Andrésen, Silva Filmer, Riyoko Ikeda. In 1971, due to the world premiere of Death in Venice, Italian director Luchino Visconti proclaimed his Tadzio as the world's most beautiful boy. 50 years later, that shadow still weighs upon Björn Andresen's life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8801666/","name":"The Most Beautiful Boy in the World","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRjODgyODUtZWJlNi00OTc3LTlhMmQtNzA2Zjc2M2M4MDY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDExMzMxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1971, due to the world premiere of Death in Venice, Italian director Luchino Visconti proclaimed his Tadzio as the world's most beautiful boy. 50 years later, that shadow still weighs upon Björn Andresen's life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8801666/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kozakiewiczjulia"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Could've been a great one","reviewBody":"This film could have been a true gem. Sadly, the fascinating background story of Luchino Visconti's "Death in Venice" quickly dissolves into a diluted, weird, shallow and to be honest simply boring exploration of what happened to the most beautiful boy in the world (without at all creating an in-depth portrait). All of the most interesting moments and crucial story parts were actually in the trailer which is great, but there's not much more to this film than the trailer.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":601,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2021-10-15","keywords":"beach,death in venice,exploitation,old man,japan","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12155251/","name":"Annike Andresen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001909/","name":"Björn Andrésen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12155254/","name":"Silva Filmer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4695054/","name":"Kristina Lindström"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677892/","name":"Kristian Petri"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0533102/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4695054/","name":"Kristina Lindström"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677892/","name":"Kristian Petri"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ma ma
Mama
Ma Ma
programme.desc: Ma ma: Directed by Julio Medem. With Penélope Cruz, Luis Tosar, Asier Etxeandia, Teo Planell. In the aftermath of a tragedy a woman, Magda, reacts with a surge of newfound life that engulfs her circle of family and friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3480886/","name":"Ma ma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyODc2MjA5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM0NDQ0ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the aftermath of a tragedy a woman, Magda, reacts with a surge of newfound life that engulfs her circle of family and friends.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3480886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"harrihuttunen"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A monstreous story","reviewBody":"I'm sure Sigmund Freund would have liked this story: Mothers and wives die one by one to give room for a new 'perfect' family. And what is the newborn Nastasja ? programme.title: Normandie nue
Naga Normandia
Normandie nue
programme.desc: Normandie nue: Directed by Philippe Le Guay. With François Cluzet, François-Xavier Demaison, Julie-Anne Roth, Pili Groyne. A French mayor has to convince his villagers to pose naked for an American photographer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6923840/","name":"Normandie nue","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ5NzgyNjUtMmMyYS00MWI3LThlMzYtYjY0YzA5MzhiM2FlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc5OTQwMzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A French mayor has to convince his villagers to pose naked for an American photographer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6923840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mmunier"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A poile Nearly Au poile!","reviewBody":"I can see the rating so far is 5.5 and I'm in agreement with this - slightly above average for me. In case you don't get my title , if you've seen the movie you probably know that "a poile" means 'naked'. Poile in french is body hair (head hair is 'cheveu' ) so 'a poile' is reminiscent of English 'Birthday suit'. As for "Au poile" it means 'perfect' (to the precision of one hair) - Non related but for your information; when one make things unnecessary difficult the expression is "couper les cheveux en quatre" Split hairS (this time head hair) in four" yes usually head hair in french is pluralised! Perhaps in English it's understood 'split hair' means in thousand parts!) I did not find the 'nakedness' idea very original after "The full Monty" and by now the use of nude calendars to promote whatever group or cause. Neither did i think there was much to save the village in the given proposition so again it was a little of a loss for me But there were some funny moments. I am a fan of Francois Cluzet and enjoyed many of his movies. This one was was more pleasant than pleasing for me . On my phone I read a critic mentioning that the subtitles were missing when English was spoken. I think it's often the case and not good for my wife and I who go to see foreign movies mainly because our defective hearing ability and know we'll get subtitles. I hope one day technology will provide some kind of glasses that shows subtitles for those who need them! But as an ex dairy farmer worker I could identify with quite a few of rural and agricultural situation although I have never had issues with the Germans or the Romanians. Else there was much of it. The ending was for me a little too "watered down" and somehow quite predictable. I was a little skeptic of the glamourous reviews on the papers so was not really disappointed as I toned down my expectation."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":989,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-10","keywords":"female full frontal nudity,male full frontal nudity,public nudity,female full rear nudity,male full rear nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1722333977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIwYjQ4YmItNzhmZS00MzhiLWEwMDItZDg3OTdkZWJiMTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIwYjQ4YmItNzhmZS00MzhiLWEwMDItZDg3OTdkZWJiMTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167388/","name":"François Cluzet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1687404/","name":"François-Xavier Demaison"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712208/","name":"Julie-Anne Roth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494355/","name":"Philippe Le Guay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021808/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025026/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2605079/","name":"Victoria Bedos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206797/","name":"Olivier Dazat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494355/","name":"Philippe Le Guay"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Notturno
Notturno
programme.desc:
Notturno: Directed by Gianfranco Rosi. Gianfranco Rosi's new documentary is an immersive portrait of those trying to survive in the war-torn Middle East." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7945450/","name":"Notturno","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzk0NGVhM2ItZDk0NC00MTUzLTljODktMTA2NWY2NGFkN2VhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Gianfranco Rosi's new documentary is an immersive portrait of those trying to survive in the war-torn Middle East.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7945450/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JohannesBlack"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tragedy and Poetry","reviewBody":"Several years ago, Gianfranco Rosi lectured to an audience of university students (myself included) about his next project: it would be filmed exclusively at night, he said, and take place over much of the Middle East. He asked that we not release any of this information - assured of the secret pact with his audience. I had more or less forgotten about this project until recently, when I discovered it had been selected as the Italian entry for the Best International Feature Film at the 93rd Academy Awards, and was being distributed by MUBI.

Notturno ("night," or "of the night") is a collection of brief glimpses into the lives of people across Syria, Lebanon, Iraq and the Kurdistan region of northern Iraq. From dark swamplands to inner cities, fisherman, soldiers and teachers, to name a few, are brought into the documentary's compass. Few words are spoken by those selected, and much of their action or routine takes place in quietness - a sort of calm in the aftermath of a terrible storm. Rosi's observational and distant study only partly takes places at night; many scenes are filmed in the soft glow of dawn or twilight, and many in bright sunlight.

For a while, I was sceptical about the documentary's artistic license. There is near-perfect composition to each frame, and the theatrical recreation of war by the amateur, psychiatric patients reminded me of Joshua Oppenheimer's The Act of Killing (where civilians and dictators are made to dramatise the traumas of their past). And yet, I found myself compelled by Notturno's visual storytelling, by the sparseness of its landscapes and sound. There are stories within these images, and sometimes they need to speak for themselves, without the aid of conventional narration or voiceover.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1012,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3691495705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ4MTMxMWYtYzIxOC00YjY0LWE0OTAtYWY1NTY5MTVhOGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ4MTMxMWYtYzIxOC00YjY0LWE0OTAtYWY1NTY5MTVhOGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Filmed over three years on the borders between Iraq, Kurdistan, Syria and Lebanon, Notturno captures the everyday life that lies behind the continuing tragedy of civil wars, ferocious dictatorships, foreign invasions and the murderous apocalypse of ISIS. Gianfranco Rosi (SACRO GRA, Venice Golden Lion Winner, FIRE AT SEA, Berlin Golden Bear winner and Oscar® nominee)constructs a sublime cinematic journey through the region finding peace and light within the chaos and despair in the aftermath of war. A mosaic of intimate moments and luminous images, Notturno is a profound and urgent cinematic achievement, from a master of the documentary form."},"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0742941/","name":"Gianfranco Rosi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0515969/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0369215/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055455/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0742941/","name":"Gianfranco Rosi"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Official Secrets: Directed by Gavin Hood. With Keira Knightley, Matt Smith, Matthew Goode, Rhys Ifans. The true story of a British whistleblower who leaked information to the press about an illegal NSA spy operation designed to push the UN Security Council into sanctioning the 2003 invasion of Iraq." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5431890/","name":"Official Secrets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjY1NWYwZmEtNGE3Ny00YTZhLThmZTMtNGI2MDY0MGU5YmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY3Nzc0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true story of a British whistleblower who leaked information to the press about an illegal NSA spy operation designed to push the UN Security Council into sanctioning the 2003 invasion of Iraq.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5431890/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jhwaldo"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant screenplay, superb acting!","reviewBody":"The screenwriting magic of the incredibly talented husband and wife team of Bernstein and Bernstein bring this true story filled with spies, treason, love and war to the big screen. Though a true story and the ending is known, this film has the viewer balanced on the edge of their seat with suspense. Kiera Knightly's best performance to date and Ralph Fiennes is brilliant as her lawyer. Every performance is excellent in this must see film when it premieres in August 2019. (Viewed at the Nantucket Film Festival June 2019)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-08-30","keywords":"whistleblower,courtroom,cafe,british politics,spy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4129995801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWE3Njg0NjctOTk0ZC00YjNjLWI5OGEtMWMyYmI4YTFhZWM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWE3Njg0NjctOTk0ZC00YjNjLWI5OGEtMWMyYmI4YTFhZWM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Katharine Gun (Keira Knightley), a British intelligence specialist whose job involves routine handling of classified information. One day in 2003, in the lead up to the Iraq War, Gun receives a memo from the NSA with a shocking directive: the United States is enlisting Britain's help in collecting compromising information on United Nations Security Council members in order to blackmail them into voting in favor of an invasion of Iraq. Unable to stand by and watch the world be rushed into an illegal war, Gun makes the decision to defy her government and leak the memo to the press. So begins an explosive chain of events that will ignite an international firestorm, expose a vast political conspiracy, and put Gun and her family directly in harm's way."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1741002/","name":"Matt Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0328828/","name":"Matthew Goode"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004303/","name":"Gavin Hood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0760923/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0681278/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0077135/","name":"Sara Bernstein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0077052/","name":"Gregory Bernstein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004303/","name":"Gavin Hood"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kokon
Kokon
programme.desc: Kokon: Directed by Leonie Krippendorff. With Lena Urzendowsky, Jella Haase, Lena Klenke, Elina Vildanova. Berlin-Kreuzberg is Nora's microcosm. Nora, the silent observer, is always tagging along: At parties, at school, at the pool, on rooftops and in apartments. Nora drifts around the monotonous housing blocks with her big sister and her friends, witnessing events that seem to cross-fade in the summer light. Girls who want to be slim and pretty, boys who say dumb things to provoke or because they are in love. Ruthless smartphone cameras and fragile teenagers. But Nora has her own way of looking at the world, and when she meets Romy, she realizes why. There is music in the air, Nora's body is changing, and caterpillars are spinning their cocoons. Realistic and taking on the protagonist's perspective, this film captures a summer of change." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10107222/","name":"Kokon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkMTYxNjctNjIyZS00NDdhLThmZDUtZTAzMDhhMzk0ZGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjAwMTE0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Berlin-Kreuzberg is Nora's microcosm. A journalist from Warsaw travels to Silesia and manages to find a tenement house full of exceptional inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6104188/","name":"Szczescie swiata","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ3OTUzZWYtYTFlNi00Y2FhLWFmMDEtMGNkOGU2OTZlYWVjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist from Warsaw travels to Silesia and manages to find a tenement house full of exceptional inhabitants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6104188/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Life of others","reviewBody":"World War 2 .. or rather the behind the scenes of everyday life before the mayhem started. Which makes sense of course and I didn't mind, understanding it all.\n\nStories are decent enough and you will care about most people/individuals overall. Drama is there and some will cherish how this was made more than others. It is very well made for sure, the acting is good too. I understand if some rate it higher just because they feel this deserves more than it currently has here on imdb. programme.title: Babyteeth
Zaraza
Ill: Final Contagium
programme.desc:
Babyteeth: Directed by Shannon Murphy. With Eliza Scanlen, Michelle Lotters, Toby Wallace, Sora Wakaki. Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8399664/","name":"Babyteeth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRhMzRkYzEtMDBjNy00YjkxLWJjNzctNzEwNGNhZDUyZWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8399664/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Acted But Very Depressing","reviewBody":"Well acted but very depressing.

Eliza Scanlan gives a fascinating performance as a young woman who's going through cancer treatment and falls for a drug addict who may or may not be good for her. Her parents (Essie Davis and Ben Mendelsohn) are dysfunctional and unraveling and have drug problems of their own. They don't like her daughter's boyfriend and under normal circumstances probably wouldn't tolerate him. But he's the only thing that brings their daughter some respite from the hell she's going through, so they sort of adopt him as their own.

"Babyteeth" is a coming of age movie that's set apart from others like it because of the protagonist's existential crisis. Scanlan's character is as immature in some ways as any sixteen year old, but at the same time is being asked to summon up reserves of maturity to deal with the ultimate curve ball life has to throw at us. How do you balance the emotional and hormonal ups and downs of teen romance with the possibility of your impending death?

The film is a bit monotonous in tone and starts to feel like a grind after a while. But again, it's worth seeing for the performances and for the unsentimental treatment of the subject matter that would have possibly segued into the maudlin in different hands. The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

programme.review: --- Actors: Eliza Scanlen (role=Milla), Michelle Lotters (role=Scarlett), Toby Wallace (role=Moses), Sora Wakaki (role=Maria), Renee Billing (role=Lisa), Zack Grech (role=Isaac), Georgina Symes (role=Polly), Essie Davis (role=Anna), Ben Mendelsohn (role=Henry), Emily Barclay (role=Toby), Eugene Gilfedder (role=Gidon), Edward Lau (role=Tin Wah)

IMDb data; ttnr: 8399664, Title: Babyteeth, --- Description: Babyteeth: Directed by Shannon Murphy. With Eliza Scanlen, Michelle Lotters, Toby Wallace, Sora Wakaki. Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8399664/","name":"Babyteeth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRhMzRkYzEtMDBjNy00YjkxLWJjNzctNzEwNGNhZDUyZWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8399664/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad","dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Acted But Very Depressing","reviewBody":"Well acted but very depressing.

Eliza Scanlan gives a fascinating performance as a young woman who's going through cancer treatment and falls for a drug addict who may or may not be good for her. Her parents (Essie Davis and Ben Mendelsohn) are dysfunctional and unraveling and have drug problems of their own. They don't like her daughter's boyfriend and under normal circumstances probably wouldn't tolerate him. But he's the only thing that brings their daughter some respite from the hell she's going through, so they sort of adopt him as their own.

"Babyteeth" is a coming of age movie that's set apart from others like it because of the protagonist's existential crisis. Scanlan's character is as immature in some ways as any sixteen year old, but at the same time is being asked to summon up reserves of maturity to deal with the ultimate curve ball life has to throw at us. How do you balance the emotional and hormonal ups and downs of teen romance with the possibility of your impending death?

The film is a bit monotonous in tone and starts to feel like a grind after a while. But again, it's worth seeing for the performances and for the unsentimental treatment of the subject matter that would have possibly segued into the maudlin in different hands. The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

programme.title: A Metamorfose dos Pássaros
Metamorfoza ptaków
A metamorfose dos pássaros
programme.desc:
A Metamorfose dos Pássaros: Directed by Catarina Vasconcelos. With Manuel Rosa, João Móra, Ana Vasconcelos, Henrique Vasconcelos. The passing away of their mothers makes Catarina and her own father meet in an emotional place that is different from the one most fathers and daughters know." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11625100/","name":"A Metamorfose dos Pássaros","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcyNDAxZWYtNzgwMy00OWRhLWJlNTktNTM0ZGIyOWY2MTk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDQwNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The passing away of their mothers makes Catarina and her own father meet in an emotional place that is different from the one most fathers and daughters know.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11625100/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wellgamertutos"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Family Epic","reviewBody":"Directed by Catarina Vasconcelos, the film narrates the life of a Portuguese family through various accounts, whether these letters, recordings, photographs or simply the artistic reinterpretation of some fact from the past.

Like other Portuguese filmmakers (Miguel Gomes, for example) the director Catarina Vasconcelos chooses to mix documentary and fiction, when reporting her family's biography and capturing with the lens the real subjects who starred in those narrated situations, but at the same time elaborating images almost surreal and filling narrative gaps with extremely deep philosophical reflections on family relationships. This has been a wonderful feature of Portuguese cinema in recent years, a factor that has earned many fans around the world, in addition to recognition at various international festivals.

Such fame is the result of the identification that we feel with realities so peculiar, but at the same time so similar to ours. When we enter the home of the family portrayed here, we observe a reality common to any family relationship. Parents and children experiencing a constant exchange of knowledge, in which children always have questions about various topics, and it is up to experienced adults to offer them satisfactory answers to this infinite range of questions.

In this regard, it is impossible not to be hooked by the poetic beauty of Metamorphosis of the Birds, when for example one of Catarina's brothers asks mother Beatriz something that moves her imaginative childhood curiosity: "do the plants think?". These are the moments that make this experience something unforgettable, since we are facing the formation of a human being's character and also the representation of a feeling that moves the world, that is, the constant search for meanings that give some meaning to life.

Such beauty seen on the screen also leaves us with a kind of moral responsibility, as the cinema of Portugal needs to be explored, especially by us Brazilians who, when watching any film produced in our former metropolis, observe in a language practically identical to ours a cultural formation quite different that, diverging from our Latin American society because it has beyond its geographic location, the history of a European country genuinely developed a cinema that is also subject to the artistic style of the old continent, so this cultural mix ends up resulting in what everyone we are passionate about images we seek ... Great films like this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":688,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Documentary","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-10-07","keywords":"father,reenactment","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11280870/","name":"Manuel Rosa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11280871/","name":"João Móra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11280872/","name":"Ana Vasconcelos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5687619/","name":"Catarina Vasconcelos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500991/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5687619/","name":"Catarina Vasconcelos"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le couperet
Ostre cięcia
Le Couperet
programme.desc:
Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Sarcastic View of the Effects of Downsizing","reviewBody":"The thirty-nine years old executive Bruno Davert (José Garcia) has been working for fifteen years in a paper company. After a merging operation with a Romania's company, he is fired in a downsizing. While unemployed for two years, Bruno loses his self-esteem and sanity and his family loses the middle-class lifestyle without cable television, Internet and regular consumption. He concludes that there is too much competition in his sector for a few job positions and decides to literally eliminate his competitors, killing those more qualified than him.

"Le Couperet" is a sarcastic view of the greed of the companies and the effects of downsizing in the self-esteem and sanity of a man. The awareness of the economical situation in France (but could be in most of the nations) and black-humor of Costas-Gravas gives a fantastic satire to the greed of the corporations, aiming exclusively profits without any care for the human beings. The sub-employment, as means of survival; the exacerbated use of merchandising to force the consumption; the situation of the family, being emotionally shattered with the stressful situation of the husband and father; all of these elements are ironically presented in this tough and realistic social satire through a French middle-class family. José Garcia is stunning in the role of a bitter man fighting to find job position and serial killer. My vote is eight.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0422015, Title: Le couperet, --- Description: Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho","dateCreated":"2007-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Sarcastic View of the Effects of Downsizing","reviewBody":"The thirty-nine years old executive Bruno Davert (José Garcia) has been working for fifteen years in a paper company. After a merging operation with a Romania's company, he is fired in a downsizing. While unemployed for two years, Bruno loses his self-esteem and sanity and his family loses the middle-class lifestyle without cable television, Internet and regular consumption. He concludes that there is too much competition in his sector for a few job positions and decides to literally eliminate his competitors, killing those more qualified than him.

"Le Couperet" is a sarcastic view of the greed of the companies and the effects of downsizing in the self-esteem and sanity of a man. The awareness of the economical situation in France (but could be in most of the nations) and black-humor of Costas-Gravas gives a fantastic satire to the greed of the corporations, aiming exclusively profits without any care for the human beings. The sub-employment, as means of survival; the exacerbated use of merchandising to force the consumption; the situation of the family, being emotionally shattered with the stressful situation of the husband and father; all of these elements are ironically presented in this tough and realistic social satire through a French middle-class family. José Garcia is stunning in the role of a bitter man fighting to find job position and serial killer. My vote is eight.

programme.title: Tu mérites un amour
Tu mérites un amour
programme.desc: Tu mérites un amour: Directed by Hafsia Herzi. With Hafsia Herzi, Djanis Bouzyani, Jérémie Laheurte, Anthony Bajon. After Rémi's infidelity, Lila has a hard time dealing with their break-up. One day, he announces that he will travel alone to Bolivia to try to understand his mistakes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10223546/","name":"Tu mérites un amour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE3ZWNjYTktMmMzOS00Y2MwLTgyNmEtZWQ4MGY5NDg1MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODA1MzEyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Rémi's infidelity, Lila has a hard time dealing with their break-up. One day, he announces that he will travel alone to Bolivia to try to understand his mistakes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10223546/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pieromonbo"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Such a good surprise! Very personal and charming movie.","reviewBody":"Many actual movies seem to me too professional and impersonal with an evident will to have an effect on the spectator. I don't like to be told what I have to feel as I'm watching a movie. That's why I liked so much "Tu mérites un amour". The director is a young woman Hafsia Herzi and it seems to be her first feature film after a short. She is also the main performer and has a rich experience as an actress. So I guess she didn't learn the job with theory and technical lessons but on the sets. It may explain her freedom and her sensibility, the way her camera loves her characters is truly moving, finding every time the right distance. A beautiful montage allows her to express in a very precise way, what she wants to tell about her characters. The subject is very thin, a young woman doesn't succeed in renouncing to a man that doesn't deserve her and cheats on her, and she deserves a love that she doesn't succeed in finding. I won't tell the end that doesn't much matter any way. Dialogues are excellent and funny. No morality preach about racism or intolerance for homosexuality; in fact no preach at all, but great portrayal of characters who try to find their way to happiness and love. Simple and straightforward but with a very delicate play of feelings.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":639,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-09-11","keywords":"title directed by female,directed by cast member,f rated,triple f rated,female protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1901640729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzNmY2YxMjktYTFhZS00NGVlLTlmNTAtNDVkMjg5Y2Q5ZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzNmY2YxMjktYTFhZS00NGVlLTlmNTAtNDVkMjg5Y2Q5ZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2082567/","name":"Hafsia Herzi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4186329/","name":"Djanis Bouzyani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5398167/","name":"Jérémie Laheurte"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2082567/","name":"Hafsia Herzi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0762139/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014456/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2082567/","name":"Hafsia Herzi"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Angel Eyes
Oczy anioła
Angel Eyes
programme.desc: Angel Eyes: Directed by Luis Mandoki. With Jennifer Lopez, Jim Caviezel, Jeremy Sisto, Terrence Howard. A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0225071/","name":"Angel Eyes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQwNzI2OTY2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTI3ODc5._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0225071/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"caspian1978"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great movie that was promoted badly","reviewBody":"Do you remember the previews for Angel Eyes? Many of us don't. What few of us remember is a 30 second preview that ran only a handful of times that showed Jennifer Lopez as a female cop. That was it. Na drama, no emotion, the previews told the audience a story about a female police officer, nothing else. This is probably the biggest reason why nobody went to see this movie when it went to the cinema. Only when it hit the video stores, did people start wo watch. A beautiful film, Angel Eyes is a romance. Dealing with redemption, it deals with many degrees of love and hope. In fact, many people detail Jennifer Lopez as "Angel Eyes." This is not true. Take a deeper look and you will see that James Caviezel is the true Angel Eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23495,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-04-17","keywords":"female police officer,kissing,wet hair,sex in sitting position,lotus position","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angel Eyes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3350593817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q5ODM1OTAtNDdiZi00MTE1LWI3NjUtODE5ZWM0YjgyNzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q5ODM1OTAtNDdiZi00MTE1LWI3NjUtODE5ZWM0YjgyNzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000182/","name":"Jennifer Lopez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001029/","name":"Jim Caviezel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001502/","name":"Luis Mandoki"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224187/","name":"Gerald Di Pego"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Good Thief
Podwójny blef
The Good Thief
programme.desc: The Good Thief: Directed by Neil Jordan. With Nutsa Kukhianidze, Ouassini Embarek, Tchéky Karyo, Marc Lavoine. An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0281820/","name":"The Good Thief","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDUyNDM5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzNTk5._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0281820/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dromasca"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stylish and Satisfying","reviewBody":"'The Good Thief' is the best film Neil Jordan did since 'Mona Lisa' almost two decades ago. It is a classical and well written robbery story, complex enough to catch the interest, simple enough for the spectator to follow and enjoy, and with the special twist at the end that makes a good script. The main character fits Nick Nolte like life, I can imagine only Humphrey Bogart doing better in this role. There are a few other memorable characters, with the Georgian (from the other Georgia) Nutza Kukhianidze promising to become soon a star if she has enough luck to continue to work with good directors and scripts. The cinematography has a special quality, with final stills after each shot, enhancing a good digital camera work. I also liked the soundtrack, it's a mix of classic, jazz and even Leonard Cohen sounds right for a change. 8/10 on my personal scale - certainly worth seeing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10380,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-02-28","keywords":"heist,casino,gambler,monte carlo,voyeur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Good Thief","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi401801497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474333/","name":"Nutsa Kukhianidze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494138/","name":"Auguste Le Breton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578483/","name":"Jean-Pierre Melville"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

Oswobodzeni
Unleashed
programme.desc: Unleashed: Directed by Finn Taylor. With Justin Chatwin, Sean Astin, Steve Howey, Kate Micucci. When a cosmic event turns Emma's dog and cat into two perfect guys, Emma reconsiders her outlook on dating, hilariously works out her trust issues, and ultimately learns to love herself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4587780/","name":"Unleashed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JmZGYwZjEtODJjZC00ZmVlLWIzZjYtZGFkNWExNmEyOTM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NzI1MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a cosmic event turns Emma's dog and cat into two perfect guys, Emma reconsiders her outlook on dating, hilariously works out her trust issues, and ultimately learns to love herself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4587780/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"delightfull","reviewBody":"It is fair to say than I love it. In fact, I adore it. For the simple motif than it is more than charming. It represents the best choice for the cat - dog owners and for the fans of romance in different form. The performances are great and the story - one of lovely crafted. Sure, it is an easy film but it has the rare gift to be, for its genre, a real gem. After so many dramas and pink romance, blockbusters and thrillers, horrors so far by originals and the army of remakes, "Unleashed" represents fresh air. For the levels of humor, for the great job of actors, for the flavor of old fashion comedy and for something who only the smile after its end could translate it. So, delightful."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2017-08-25","keywords":"cat,dog,transformation,male nudity,male rear nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unleashed","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1838070553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM4Nzc1NTktOGJlNS00MzA4LWE0YjItMmRiZTliOWE0ZGQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM4Nzc1NTktOGJlNS00MzA4LWE0YjItMmRiZTliOWE0ZGQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Unleashed"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154226/","name":"Justin Chatwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000276/","name":"Sean Astin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0992538/","name":"Steve Howey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852363/","name":"Finn Taylor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0491058/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852363/","name":"Finn Taylor"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Against the Sun
programme.desc: Against the Sun: Directed by Brian Peter Falk. With Garret Dillahunt, Tom Felton, Jake Abel, Nadia Parra. A WWII pilot, bombardier, and radioman find themselves adrift on a lifeboat without food or water after being forced to ditch their plane during a scouting mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2557276/","name":"Against the Sun","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk5MjU0NTg3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI3NTUzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A WWII pilot, bombardier, and radioman find themselves adrift on a lifeboat without food or water after being forced to ditch their plane during a scouting mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2557276/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cuthbertjoel"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Decent Small Budget Movie","reviewBody":"I'm not going to concentrate my review on one scene involving a CGI shark. I will say it looked obscenely fake and did somewhat detach you from that scene as you were too busy preoccupied with the leftover Sharknado prop. Otherwise the film was pretty good. Felton, Delahunt and Abel were all very solid and really evoked the feelings of desperation and humanity relating to the subject of the film. Their performances were enough for me to actually care about the characters and given its also a true story, I found myself more than adequately emotionally invested in the film. There's definitely issues with the film. The score is very hit and miss. Especially the second rate Jaws music in some of the scenes. I've watched hundreds of films worse than this in the last year or so. Did more than enough to keep me watching for 1hr 40mins.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5614,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2015-01-23","keywords":"disaster at sea,survival,disaster film,survival film,based on real events","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Against the Sun","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1977334297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJjMTAwYmEtNDZkNi00Yzc0LTllNTUtODIxZmFkOWNhNmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJjMTAwYmEtNDZkNi00Yzc0LTllNTUtODIxZmFkOWNhNmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Against the Sun"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226813/","name":"Garret Dillahunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0271657/","name":"Tom Felton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1831976/","name":"Jake Abel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1803137/","name":"Brian Peter Falk"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176864/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1803137/","name":"Brian Peter Falk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5405965/","name":"Mark David Keegan"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Condemned
Potępiony
The Condemned
programme.desc:
The Condemned: Directed by Scott Wiper. With Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone, Tory Mussett. Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0443473/","name":"The Condemned","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkyOTczMjU0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDExMzM0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers f","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0443473/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rawiri42"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Did some people miss the clue?","reviewBody":"There are lots of pretty negative reviews of this movie and one has to wonder why those people watched it in the first place. Did they miss the essential clue as to what they would get? The opening credits clearly tell everyone that this a WWE movie. It would seem, therefore, that those who don't like the fake, meticulously staged regular offerings of World Wrestling Entertainment wouldn't want to watch this either. That isn't rocket science - is it?

But no, the wowsers and wet-nellies just HAD to watch it anyway - and then grumble and whinge about gratuitous violence and sadism. If they don't like professional wrestling, then there's a pretty sure chance they're not going to like The Condemned so why did they watch it at all? Mind you, I wouldn't mind betting that, if the story were ever true, those wowsers and wet-nellies would be among the first to sign up to watch the programme on the Internet - and then still complain! It's a bit like the well-known fact that the most vociferous anti-porn campaigners also happen to own the biggest collections of porn! (Of course it's all kept as "proof" of just how corrupted the world is - or so they say!)

OK, getting to this movie for what it is. It is a B-grade action flick with mostly B-grade actors (although there ar a few exceptions to that). Personally, I thought the story concept was quite good. The real protagonist is an entrepreneurial guy who knows that an awful lot of people actually do like gratuitous violence (he probably did research on how many viewers professional wrestling gets) and decides to convert that into a reality show. The problem is that no self-respecting TV network would ever run it and so he resorts to the obvious and puts it, live streaming on the Internet.

Without wanting to introduce any spoilers, I will stick to what the film's own promos state, which is that ten convicted criminals from death-rows around the world (another clever ploy to ensure that the maximum audience can be secured to support "their" champion) are let loose on an island which is rigged with numerous cameras and told that they must each defend themselves against the other nine as only one of them can ultimately survive. The survivor will be freed with a new identity and a big wad of money to go and do whatever he likes. There are a few little "twists" thrown in for good measure and I'll leave those who want to watch it to find out what they are. I found that I was placing myself into the shoes of each of the criminals and wondering how I could make the best of the situation. Of course, the first thing I had to do was remember that I was already sentenced to death and then view the situation from that standpoint. Secondly, I had to remember that my opponents were also killers and thus there was no room for compassion on either their parts or mine.

With that frame-of-mind established, I found myself entering into the story with a different attitude than I would have had it been presented differently. I was reminded of "Running Man" as far as the plot went but the difference was that this movie is set in the present and, as such, was (with some imagination) "believable."

OK, 'nuff said. If you don't mind action with lots of violence, then you will probably enjoy The Condemned. If you like Mary Poppins and romances, then don't watch this movie. Simple really!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51401,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-04-27","keywords":"island,last man standing,website,jungle,tied feet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Condemned (2007)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4169335321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE2Mzk5MDYtMDM0Mi00Y2E0LWJhMzMtNzJmYTE3OTc4ZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE2Mzk5MDYtMDM0Mi00Y2E0LWJhMzMtNzJmYTE3OTc4ZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film about a deadly game show"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0042524/","name":"Steve Austin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005068/","name":"Vinnie Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428923/","name":"Nathan Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007045/","name":"Scott Wiper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135725/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007045/","name":"Scott Wiper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373154/","name":"Rob Hedden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373151/","name":"Andy Hedden"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Heist
Skok
Heist
programme.desc:
Heist: Directed by David Mamet. With Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito, Delroy Lindo, Sam Rockwell. A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0252503/","name":"Heist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiNTNlZTMtZjlmNC00ZGI0LWI2YjctODA4MzNlYjEyNzQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0252503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RowdyHagg"},"dateCreated":"2001-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tries too hard","reviewBody":"Knowing the quality of Mamet's previous works, maybe I expected too much out of this one, but as it stands I just wasn't impressed by this film. Am I the only one who got bored during this movie? The characters were good except Fran (Rebecca Pidgeon). She is just there to deliver one-liners the whole time and provide sex appeal. I know her demeanor is quiet and conniving, but she just struts around waiting to make overly witty replies. The rest of the cast were excellent, Delroy Lindo outshined Hackman as his right-hand thug, Ricky Jay pulls off the calm and collected badass, Sam Rockwell delivers a good presence that you just hate, DeVito was awesome as the break-your-balls "bad" criminal and Hackman played his part well as he always does.

 The story bored me however. You knew what was going to happen before it happened and there were too many twists in the movie that they lost their affect. Twists are good when used sparingly and when used at the right time. I didn't like the timing of them in this movie or the overuse of them. It got boring because the characters always pull something out of their hat when you "least expect it."

 For me dialogue has to be two things, witty and believable. Now the dialogue in this film is witty, Mamet probably took a while to compile all these quotes into one movie, but it is too much. It is simply to much. All Rebecca Pidgeon says is these crafty responses and she engages no real conversation. As for believable, people don't speak like this. No one, not even the coolest cat in the world and half the time I am trying to figure out what the hell they mean.

 The plot is way too contrived, it is too much. Their is a backup plan, for a backup plan, for a backup plan, for a ... The scene on the runway was crap, impossible. Never would have happened. Too many "overly" perfect plans and too many twists make this plot boring to watch.

 Wait for the rental.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35130,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-10-09","keywords":"heist,heist movie,time bomb,gang,robbery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Heist (2001)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi447545625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM5MTA5YmMtNzU0OS00ZTAyLTgyMTktYTg3YmIzNjg2MDQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM5MTA5YmMtNzU0OS00ZTAyLTgyMTktYTg3YmIzNjg2MDQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000432/","name":"Gene Hackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682071/","name":"Rebecca Pidgeon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000362/","name":"Danny DeVito"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000519/","name":"David Mamet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036309/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000519/","name":"David Mamet"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

 The story bored me however. You knew what was going to happen before it happened and there were too many twists in the movie that they lost their affect. Twists are good when used sparingly and when used at the right time. I didn't like the timing of them in this movie or the overuse of them. It got boring because the characters always pull something out of their hat when you "least expect it."

 For me dialogue has to be two things, witty and believable. Now the dialogue in this film is witty, Mamet probably took a while to compile all these quotes into one movie, but it is too much. It is simply to much. All Rebecca Pidgeon says is these crafty responses and she engages no real conversation. As for believable, people don't speak like this. No one, not even the coolest cat in the world and half the time I am trying to figure out what the hell they mean.

 The plot is way too contrived, it is too much. Their is a backup plan, for a backup plan, for a backup plan, for a ... The scene on the runway was crap, impossible. Never would have happened. Too many "overly" perfect plans and too many twists make this plot boring to watch.

 Wait for the rental.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35130,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-10-09","keywords":"heist,heist movie,time bomb,gang,robbery","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Heist (2001)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi447545625","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM5MTA5YmMtNzU0OS00ZTAyLTgyMTktYTg3YmIzNjg2MDQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM5MTA5YmMtNzU0OS00ZTAyLTgyMTktYTg3YmIzNjg2MDQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000432/","name":"Gene Hackman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682071/","name":"Rebecca Pidgeon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000362/","name":"Danny DeVito"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000519/","name":"David Mamet"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036309/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000519/","name":"David Mamet"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1524137/","name":"Contraband","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3NzY5NTg0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODk4MzgxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1524137/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nathan-276"},"dateCreated":"2012-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Contraband- 5 category review","reviewBody":"Directing 6/10- Some unique and intriguing shots, but nothing too rememberable Acting 8.5/10- The acting is the category that without a doubt, stole the show. Solid efforts from the entire cast but the film really benefited from tremendous performances from Ribisi and Landry Jones. Screenplay 4/10- The screenplay is fun no doubt and benefits from decent pacing and a few intense action sequences but the film lacks originality, stealing concepts and at times, lines. Visual effects 5/10- The visual effects were average. I can't completely fault a film for not using unnecessary visuals. Sound effects/Music 5/10- The sound effects were fine, nothing misplaced there. The music was again just OK, sometimes the music was great and mixed well with the action going on but in some the haunting/emotional scenes the music didn't make the scene 'better', which is what it should do. Overall, the film is just another forgettable action film. The film has decent enough story (though cliché), with great acting and some fun action sequences that make the film at least worth a viewing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-01-25","keywords":"smuggling,prison,cocaine,action violence,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3802766873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MzE0NTg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjk5OTU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MzE0NTg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjk5OTU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A reformed criminal returns to his old ways when his brother-in-law gets into trouble. programme.title: Stir of Echoes
Opętanie
Stir of Echoes
programme.desc:
Stir of Echoes: Directed by David Koepp. With Zachary David Cope, Kevin Bacon, Kathryn Erbe, Illeana Douglas. After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0164181/","name":"Stir of Echoes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2NTEwZWYtYzcxYi00MzZhLTg0NDMtNTBhMTM3MjEyMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0164181/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mentalcritic"},"dateCreated":"2000-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horribly underrated","reviewBody":"In 1999, the media was in a frenzy about a new film that used real things to terrify and excite its audience. Stir Of Echoes was not it. Partly due to the studio's financial difficulties, Stir Of Echoes came and went by itself, unsung and unappreciated. Which goes to show that recognition in the Hollywood system does not go to innovators or the best storytellers. It is all about marketability, and while Stir Of Echoes had this, the companies involved in making or distributing it did not seem to want to spend the cash involved in taking advantage. Either that or Artisan and Fox decided to use it as their tax write-off for that year.

I have not read the novel by Richard Matheson, so I cannot comment on how faithfully the film follows its source. But that is irrelevant. When compared to its more big-name competitor, at least Stir Of Echoes has the courtesy to acknowledge its source. The film updates the story to a more modern era, thus saving a few dollars, since period pieces are expensive to make. In fact, the dramatic angle of the film keeps it rather cheap, since effects shots are few and far between. Not to mention the effects that do appear are fairly simple in nature. Indeed, Stir Of Echoes only cost about thirteen million to make, according to estimates. Which makes it all the more peculiar that Fox was unwilling to invest a little more effort in publicising the film.

Kevin Bacon is in fine, fine form as the film's central hero, a regular guy called Tom Witzky. Kathryn Erbe is also in great form as his wife, Maggie. Illeana Douglas is decidedly odd as his sister-in-law, Lisa. But the real surprise here is child performer Zachary David Cope. After the pretender, that pile of sachaarine garbage called The Sixth Sense, child stars had such a bad reputation that Zachary deserves a medal for portraying such a genuinely likable, layered character. Indeed, director David Koepp took one hell of a risk by placing so much of the responsibility for the plot on his shoulders. That it pays off is a testament not only to the strength of Zachary David Cope's performance, but to the strength of the material he was given. Indeed, all the best scenes in Stir Of Echoes involve interaction between Zachary, Kathryn, and Kevin.

I do think this film has its faults. Chief among them is that the story needed another ten minutes to properly develop. Plot threads like the group of psychics, a member of which helps put Kathryn Erbe's character on the path of greater understanding, needed better resolution. One moment, Maggie is asking this policeman why her husband is obsessed with a scene of memories to the exclusion of his job. The next moment, not only are details like the job forgotten, so too is the group and the policeman. Smoothing out intricate plot points such as this would have helped the story no end.

In the end, however, Stir Of Echoes is proof that the artistic work one does not hear about may just be the one that has more merit. If nothing else, it is worth watching to see a small ensemble cast that excels. Even small performances like Liza Weil's demonstrate a sense of dramatic flair that has long fled most of the rest of Hollywood. It is for this reason that I gave Stir Of Echoes an eight out of ten. It is worth watching just to see how badly misdirected the hype machine often is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79328,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-09-10","keywords":"hypnosis,seeing a ghost,missing person,psychic power,haunted house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stir of Echoes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1653276953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAyMjM3ODEtYzA4Yi00NGM0LWI5YzctYWYwNTIxMDg5YWEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAyMjM3ODEtYzA4Yi00NGM0LWI5YzctYWYwNTIxMDg5YWEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0178574/","name":"Zachary David Cope"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002062/","name":"Kathryn Erbe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014903/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558577/","name":"Richard Matheson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Streamerka
programme.desc: Wojowniczka Sonja (Brigitte Nielsen), właścicielka magicznego miecza, zamierza pomścić śmierć swojej siostry, Varny (Janet Agren) - kapłanki i strażniczki potężnego talizmanu. Została ona zabita przez złą królową Gedren (Sandahl Bergman). Wojowniczce, która zamierza również odzyskać talizman siostry, pomaga szlachetny Kalidor (Arnold Schwarzenegger). Film Richarda Fleischera, twórcy m.in. "Conana Niszczyciela", powiela wszystkie słabe i mocne strony gatunku fantasy.

programme.title: Red Sonja
Czerwona Sonja
Red Sonja
programme.desc:
Red Sonja: Directed by Richard Fleischer. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Brigitte Nielsen, Sandahl Bergman, Paul L. Smith. The fearless warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom from the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089893/","name":"Red Sonja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGEyYTE3MDYtMzNkNC00YzQ1LTk3ODYtY2ZlM2I0ZWU1NWFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDc2NjEyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fearless warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom from the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089893/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"King_Opossum"},"dateCreated":"2000-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"OK I admit I enjoyed it!!","reviewBody":"Let's just settle this before I start - this is a bad bad movie! You will be hard pressed to find such awful acting anywhere as Miss Nielsen, 'veteran' director Richard Fleischer stumbles blindly through a non-existant plot, and you will feel absolutely no sympathy for either the good guys or the bad - in other words you just won't care!

I would love to have hated this film - as a self-proclaimed 'movie-buff' this is the kind of film I should not even go near. But I'm loathed to admit...I enjoyed it! The two stars, amongst their awful acting, are actually quite engaging in a comedic way (intentional or not!). I began to relish the dialogue scenes just to see if a line could have been delivered with any more wood! The intentional comedy comes from a young prince (Ernie Reyes Jr) and his bodyguard (Paul Smith). Although I wished the prince to find the end of a sword as quickly as possible from his first scene, the interplay between these two characters was amusing, with some one-liners that could not have been more out of place in this film! The villainous queen (played by Sandahl Bergman) is unfortunately bland and forgettable. But one real treat for me was another completely out-of-place commodity - a great rousing score from maestro Ennio Morricone!

This was Schwarzenegger's return to his CONAN genre after hitting it big with THE TERMINATOR. It isn't too surprising that this was the last 'swords and sorcery' movie he did - but I promise you won't hate it!
